pages.text: This charm allows its user to communicate with animals and other docile beasts like spiders during daytime. Using the charm, a creature can trade with the animal. This approach might be considered an alternative for acquiring ingredients that are usually obtained by slaying the animal. Use the charm on a creature to try to trade with it.

pages.title: Special Trades
pages.text: Rarely, a creature might have some truly exceptional items and they might be willing to trade them.$(p)The charm also allows to trade with some types of monsters when they are not hostile to the charm's user. Remember that some $(item)Clothing$() might have just the properties you're looking for.
